OCPS Job Manager API
============================================

The OCSP Job Manager API spec is documented using the OpenAPI format in ``ocps_job_manager.openapi.yaml`` in this directory (:download:`ocps_job_manager.openapi.yaml`). To view the rendered API spec in a navigable webpage, run ::

   docker run -p 8080:80 -v $PWD:/usr/share/nginx/html nginx:1.19.0

and then open http://localhost:8080 in your browser.
